summary:
The Republic of Texas was an independent state from 1836 to 1846. It broke away from Mexico during the Texas Revolution and was recognized by the United States in 1837. Texas used two national flags during this period: the Burnet Flag (1836–1839) and the Lone Star Flag (1839–1846).

Texas was annexed by the United States in 1845, becoming the 28th state. This annexation led to a war with Mexico, as they refused to recognize Texas's independence.
title: Republic of Texas
